text: Makhete Diop (born 8 July 1987) is a Senegalese footballer. He currently plays for Al-Shabab, which competes in the Saudi Professional League. He plays as a striker. ==Club career== ===Early career=== Diop previously played for Al Watani in the Saudi League. He was the leading goalscorer in the 2009–10 Lebanese league. ===Al-Karamah=== On August 2010, Diop signed for Syrian League Club Al-Karamah on a three-year deal. == Honours == === Individual === Awards * Lebanese Premier League Golden Ball: 2009–10 * Lebanese Premier League Team of the Season: 2009–10 Performances * Lebanese Premier League top goalscorer: 2009–10 == References == ==External links== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Senegalese footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Port Autonome players Category:Al-Watani players Category:ASC Yakaar players Category:Nejmeh SC players Category:Al-Karamah players Category:Al Dhafra FC players Category:Al Ahli Club (Dubai) players Category:Shabab Al-Ahli Club players Category:Beijing Renhe F.C. players Category:Al-Shabab FC (Riyadh) players Category:Senegalese expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Saudi Arabia Category:Expatriate footballers in Lebanon Category:Expatriate footballers in Syria Category:Expatriate footballers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Expatriate footballers in China Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:UAE Pro League players Category:Lebanese Premier League players Category:Chinese Super League players Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Saudi Arabia Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Lebanon Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Syria Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in the United Arab Emirates Category:Syrian Premier League players Category:Lebanese Premier League top scorers
title: Makhete Diop
